Articles.Content: Hello! I installed MechJeb2-2.5.8.0 I can see it on my parts, I can attach it to my rockets, but the side bar never appear, so I can never make MechJeb functional. What I'm missing here guys? Any idea?

KSP 1.1.3 only without dev build. Did use the dev build?

https://ksp.sarbian.com/jenkins/job/MechJeb2-Dev/645/ Working fine so far with a drop down bar.

It is getting better. Love that new beta scripting tool.

Edited October 30, 2016 by nobodyhasthis2
